SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Channels
The Channels class provides functionality to read channel names from a text file and format them as a string.
Client
The Client class connects to a server, allows the user to select a channel, choose a username, and facilitates the sending and receiving of messages.
Commands
The Commands class handles the execution of various commands issued by users, such as retrieving user information, messaging, channel operations, and more.
Listener
The Listener class implements the Runnable interface to continuously listen for and print incoming messages from the server.
Peticio
The Peticio class represents a client connection and handles user input, channel selection, and message processing for each connected user.
Sender
The Sender class implements the Runnable interface to send messages to the server.
Servidor
The Servidor class represents the server that listens for incoming client connections, assigns each client to a thread, and manages a list of connected clients.
UserNameStatus
Enum representing the possible status of a user's chosen username
